external_games.name: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The Iron Maiden 2nd Portable

name: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The Iron Maiden 2nd Portable
summary: PSP version of the visual novel/adventure game based on the popular anime series. It takes place in the alternate universe from episode 26 of the TV series, and is not a true sequel to the original Iron Maiden/Girlfriend of Steel game.
